activities.title: Diploma Digital Media & IT specializing in Computer Software Development
activities.location: Northern Alberta Institute of Technology - Edmonton, Alberta
activities.description: During my studies at NAIT I enrolled in a variety of programs such as Front-End Web Development, Web Design Fundamentals, Advanced Web Concepts, Intermediate Application Development, Quality Assurance & Software Testing, Systems Analysis & Design. For my efforts I received an Exemplary Academic Achievement Award in the Digital Media & IT Program for the Winter 2020 Semester and I was on Dean's Honor Roll two times (Fall 2020 & Fall 2021).

activities.title: Intern/Practicum Placement
activities.description: At Web3 I researched, photoshopped and printed unique web designs. I assisted in day-to-day office tasks such as relaying messages and running errands

activities.title: Diploma Network & Database Management
activities.description: At CDI I learned how to build computers and I learned how to work with databases and networking infrastructure.
